highlights: Built a clean Spring Boot backend with layered architecture separating controller, service, repository, and domain logic
Used Flyway migrations with Hibernate schema validation to prevent database drift across environments
Designed a shared BaseEntity with UUID primary keys and automatic createdAt and updatedAt auditing
Modeled Category and Product domain with proper JPA relationships, constraints, and indexes for integrity and performance
Implemented Spring Data JPA repositories with pagination, sorting, and custom query methods
Encapsulated business logic in a transactional service layer with clear domain exceptions
Standardized API responses using DTOs and a global exception handler for consistent error handling
Configured global CORS to enable safe frontend integration during development
Added environment-specific configuration for dev and test profiles
Integrated Testcontainers with PostgreSQL to run realistic, CI-safe integration tests
